column5: I love all if them btw!! also i get this is controversial, pls keep in mind this is just my ranking and does not necessarily reflect yours

not a great movie by any means but I respect it for what it was trying to be and, come on, emo peter rules
(I have a very soft spot for ‚lost potential‘ movies leave me alone)
just a silly goofy time, the weakest one tho IMO. I just didn’t connect with it really
